title: You pretty little ladies will do so. Or, A match made up against the Whitson-Holy-days. This ditty was composed, the truth is so, by a young-man that did a maiden wooe ... To the tune of, Lusty Bacchus, &c.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright.,
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd. ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
